732930f.title: Social conditions in Manhattan.
732930f.text:
Social Conditions in Manhattan: In the dark, narrow hall, one spigot
provides all the water used by four families for drinking, cooking, clean-
ing, washing, etc. The boy shown is an undersised, thin, pale lad of 7;
his sister is a year older. The building stands on East 3rd Street, between
First Ave. and Ave. A and is owned by a wealthy family which turns over
its property to agents. This photo was published in the New York Evening
World of December 10, 1923.
December 10, 1923.
0ift of New York Vorld.
MAY BE REPPODUCED.
2D21  NE.GNR W7
